title: Quizzer
description: The quizzer is a project where the goal was to make a pub quiz. It consists of 3 apps (the host, the scoreboard and the teams) and a server.
stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, ws, Sass

title: Rekenlogboek
description: The rekenlogboek is an app that helps teachers to keep track of the progress students make with maths. A part of the app is available in Microsoft Teams. The app consists of a client and a server.
stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, Socket.io, Sass

title: Eenmaal Andermaal
description: Eenmaal Andermaal is an auction website. People can search for auctions in a lot of different categories and make a bid.

title: Fruitcatcher
description: Fruitcatcher is a game in which the player has to catch falling fruit and dodge other falling objects.
